statement.p: A triangular parcel of land has sides of lengths 750 feet, 110 feet and 758 feet. All of these measurements have 3 significant digits (might not appear as such).
a) What is the area of the parcel of land?
Round your answer to appropriate significant figures.
b) If land is valued at 1500 per acre (1 acre is 43,560 \displaystyle\text{feet}^{{2}} ), what is the value of the parcel of land?
Round your answer to the nearest dollar.
